commit message:
Update Bitcoin.java

V2 of the 'What is Bitcoin'-video is available.

Merge pull request #95 from hipio/patch-1

Update Bitcoin.java
Depend on Design Support library
Replace melnykov's FAB with a `native` one

Revert 'Replace melnykov's FAB with a `native` one'

This reverts commit acc7284edcc9685f3035beddfb1a491c05b7f1b3.
Broadcast AcDisplay state changes over the OS
Introduce AlarmSwitch.java
KeyguardService: Don't show the lock above an alarm
KeyguardService: No need of special AlarmSwitch callback
ActivityBase: Minor code clean-up
Settings: Allow to enable the keyguard for all devices
MDPreference: Merge exception clauses into a one
Notifications: Remove all color text appearance spans
Minor code clean-up
Don't reset the Keyguard state due to permissions
Keyguard: Add strings for security options
KeyguardService: Lock delay support
Experimental: Disable home button for a few 4.3- devices
KeyguardService: Mark `mLocked` as `true` if AcDisplay activity is currently visible
Remove TODO from security disclaimer string
Disable 'Quick glance' option by default
Update `leakcanary` from v1.3 to v1.3.1
Update android-checkout from v0.6.+ to v0.7.+
Manifest: Set large heap to true
Auto-update translations
Bump version to 72/3.8
